short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the current time with a vintage watch even if you don't have one on your wrist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome add-on I created offers several features that may be of interest to both watch lovers and users looking for interesting browser add-ons. Users can now enjoy the view of the beautiful vintage watches without leaving the browser. It shows the current time including the user's local time zone. The 12/24 hour graduation on the dial streamlines the reading of the time. The seconds hand works identically to the mechanical version of the watch
